queries.name: What are the materials of product 0x01?
What are the tiles of building B0?
queries.query:
PREFIX oo: <http://purl.org/openorg/>
PREFIX ao: <http://purl.org/ontology/ao/core#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX d: <https://www.example/com/data/>
PREFIX o: <https://www.example/com/ont/>

SELECT
	?tile
WHERE {
  d:building-B0 o:has-floor-tile ?tile .
}
ORDER BY ?tile

queries.name: What are the tiles of the building with address: 88 Fairview Street Mount Laurel, NJ 08054?
queries.query:
PREFIX oo: <http://purl.org/openorg/>
PREFIX ao: <http://purl.org/ontology/ao/core#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX d: <https://www.example/com/data/>
PREFIX o: <https://www.example/com/ont/>

SELECT
	?tile
WHERE {
  ?b a o:Building ;
    o:address "88 Fairview Street Mount Laurel, NJ 08054";
    o:has-floor-tile ?tile .
}
ORDER BY ?tile

queries.name: Which tiles are present in buildings?
queries.query:
PREFIX oo: <http://purl.org/openorg/>
PREFIX ao: <http://purl.org/ontology/ao/core#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX d: <https://www.example/com/data/>
PREFIX o: <https://www.example/com/ont/>

SELECT
	?tile
WHERE {
	?b
    a o:Building;
    o:has-floor-tile ?tile 
  .
}
ORDER BY ?tile
